relation: New Konqueror bookmarks using Akonadi and Nepomuk, awesome bar
Sidebar cleanups; re-introducing the history module
Improved search bar including search configuration
Refactoring of Information Panel. KMetaDataWidget and KMetaDataConfigurationDialog should be moved to kdelibs.
Remember the Details View expansion state, at least in the DolphinPart
Restore the "Edit->Selection" menu that was in Konqueror 3
Open URL in a new tab if the Back, Forward or Up button in the toolbar is middle-clicked
